items.name: Protein-Packed Veggie Omelette
items.description: A fluffy omelette filled with spinach, tomatoes, and bell peppers, topped with feta cheese for a delicious start to your day.

items.name: Chicken Fajita Bowl
items.description: Grilled chicken breast served over brown rice with saut√©ed bell peppers, onions, and a sprinkle of lime juice, topped with avocado slices.

items.name: Spaghetti with Turkey Meatballs
items.description: Whole wheat spaghetti served with homemade turkey meatballs in a rich marinara sauce, garnished with fresh basil and parmesan cheese.

items.name: Greek Yogurt with Honey and Nuts
items.description: Creamy Greek yogurt drizzled with honey and topped with a mix of almonds and walnuts for a satisfying snack.

items.name: Hummus and Veggie Sticks
items.description: A colorful platter of carrot, cucumber, and bell pepper sticks served with a side of creamy hummus for dipping.
